title: GET_PED_DECORATIONS
content:
0x7CCE1163// GetPedDecorations
object GET_PED_DECORATIONS(Ped ped);Parameters:ped: The ped you want to retrieve data for.Returns: An object containing a list of applied decorations.Returns a list of decorations applied to a ped.The data returned adheres to the following layout:[ [ collectionHash1, overlayHash1 ], ..., [c ollectionHashN, overlayHashN ] ]This command will return undefined data if invoked on a remote player ped.
